path.description: Indicates JSON Pointer value such as /foo/bar. Although this is a string, HR Open requires a json-pointer format. Do not use JSON Pointer URI fragments such as #/foo/bar

value.description: Indicates the value the field should have.

orderId.description: Provides the Identifier of the ScreeningVendorOrder to which this message pertains. Uniquely identifies a ScreeningVendorOrder within an organization.

fields.description: A list of fields that need attention.

attachments.description: List of documents associated with this message
